articles.title: Shiffrin pushes past late mistake to win giant slalom gold at world championships - CBC Sports
articles.description: American skier Mikaela Shiffrin won the gold medal in the women's giant slalom at the world championships Thursday. Shiffrin overcame a mistake near the end of the race to hold on to her first-run lead to beat Italian skier Federica Brignone by 0.12 seconds.
articles.content: Mikaela Shiffrin covered her mouth with her fluorescent orange mittens and then collapsed to the snow, still breathing heavily as her entire body pulsated from the exertion of her gold medal-winning … [+5057 chars]
